PRIVATE_KEY_SUBTITLE: Введите пароль, чтобы увидеть приватный ключ
PASSWORD_WARNING: Приватный ключ дает полный доступ к вашему аккаунту, убедитесь, что он спрятан надежно.
KEEP_YOUR_PRIVATE_KEY_SAFE: Храните приватный ключ в надежном месте
SIMPLE_WALLET_WARNING: We are not responsible for any loss that could be due to the entropy of key generation.
PRIVATE_KEY_WALLET_WARNING: Private key wallets use ONLY a password to encrypt the imported private key. Therefore it's crucial to select a SAFE password.
IMPORT_ACCOUNT_QR_WARNING: To use QR wallet scanner, you must use the same password as your current wallet account
NAME: Имя
ALERT_SUBTITLE_ONLY_TESTNET: Remember that at the moment it only works on testnet
ALERT_SUBTITLE_PHONE_DISCONNECTED: Open the app again once you have internet connection
ALERT_ONLY_MOBILE_DEVICE: This functionallity it is only available in mobile devices
ALERT_CONTACT_ALREADY_EXISTS: Contact with provided address already exists.
SEED_WARNING: Запишите сид-фразу для возможности восстановления доступа, в случае потери данных.
WRITE_WORDS: Пожалуйста, внимательно перепишите или скопируйте эти 12 слов.
CONFIRM_ON_NEXT_SCREEN: Фразу ноебходимо будет подтвердить на следующем экране.
INTRO_F_TEXT: Become part of a fast-growing area of the drypto world. You are the only person who can access crepto assets.
INTRO_S_TEXT: Store, manage and receive interest on your digital assets balance, easly and securely.
INTRO_T_TEXT: Trade quickly and securely. You retain complete control over your funds when trading them on our decentralised exchange.
ARUS_DIFFERENT: Arus is different - it cannot be held safely by a bank or web service.
TERM_ONE: I understand that my funds are held securely on this device, not by a company.
TERM_TWO: I understand that if this app is moved to another device or deleted, my funds can only be recovered with the backup phrase.
TERM_THREE: I have read, understood, and agree to the Terms of Use.
WELCOME_TO_AP_TEXT: Please take some time to understand some important things for your own safety. We cannot recover your funds or freeze your account if you visit a phishing site or lose your backup phrase (aka SEED phrase). By continuing to use our platform, you agree to accept all risks associated with the loss of your SEED, including but not limited to the inability to obtain your funds and dispose of them. In case you lose your SEED, you agree and acknowledge that the Waves Platform would not be responsible for the negative consequences of this.
ABOUT_SEED: What you need to know about your SEED
ABOUT_SEED_TEXT: When registering your account, you will be asked to save your secret phrase (Seed) and to protect your account with a password. On normal centralized servers, special attention is paid to the password, which can be changed and reset via email, if the need arises. However, on decentralized platforms such as Waves, everything is arranged differently.
WANT_TO_EN_FP: Do you want to enable fingerprint authentification?
BACKUP_PAGE_CONTENT: Write down the secret phrase and store it safely. Secret phrase is the only way to restore your wallet and access funds in it.

We cannot recover your funds or freeze your account if you visit a phishing site or lose your backup phrase (aka SEED phrase). By continuing to use our platform, you agree to accept all risks associated with the loss of your SEED, including but not limited to the inability to obtain your funds and dispose of them. In case you lose your SEED, you agree and acknowledge that the Waves Platform would not be responsible for the negative consequences of this.
WELCOME_SLIDE2_TITLE: What you need to know about your SEED

On normal centralized servers, special attention is paid to the password, which can be changed and reset via email, if the need arises.
